prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- A comprehensive study and comparison of core technologies for MPEG 3-D point cloud compression, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Liu et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- 3D Point Cloud Attribute Compression Using Geometry-Guided Sparse Representation, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Gu et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC), was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Graziosi et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- 3D point cloud compression: A survey, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as Cao et al., 2019 on your answer). 
- A comprehensive study of the rate-distortion performance in MPEG point cloud compression, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as Alexiou et al., 2019 on your answer).
response:
根据您的要求，以下是从提供的文献中提取的关于MPEG 3D点云压缩技术的不同有利方法或证据的回答：

### 1. MPEG 3D点云压缩的核心技术分析（Liu et al., 2020）

在《A Comprehensive Study and Comparison of Core Technologies for MPEG 3D Point Cloud Compression》中，作者详细比较了MPEG点云压缩的三种模型类别：TMC1、TMC2和TMC3。其中，TMC2因其在密集点云的压缩效率最佳而被特别提及，尤其是在有损几何和有损颜色压缩方面（Liu et al., 2020）。

### 2. 基于几何引导的稀疏表示的3D点云属性压缩（Gu et al., 2020）

《3D Point Cloud Attribute Compression Using Geometry-Guided Sparse Representation》提出了一种新颖有效的压缩方案，通过几何引导的稀疏表示（GSR）消除每个块内的冗余，并应用块间预测方案去除块间的冗余。实验结果表明，该方案在各种基准数据集上都能达到更好的率失真性能和视觉质量（Gu et al., 2020）。

### 3. 点云压缩标准化活动概述（Graziosi et al., 2020）

《An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC)》概述了MPEG正在进行的点云压缩标准化活动，包括视频基础（V-PCC）和几何基础（G-PCC）两种方法。V-PCC通过将点云数据从3D转换为2D，利用现有的2D视频编码器进行编码；而G-PCC直接在3D空间中编码内容，使用如八叉树等数据结构（Graziosi et al., 2020）。

### 4. 3D点云压缩技术综述（Cao et al., 2019）

《3D Point Cloud Compression: A Survey》提供了3D点云压缩技术的全面概述，包括1D遍历压缩技术、2D投影方法和直接3D去相关技术。这些方法涵盖了从简单的预测方案到复杂的基于图的变换（Cao et al., 2019）。

### 5. MPEG点云压缩的率失真性能综合研究（Alexiou et al., 2019）

《A comprehensive study of the rate-distortion performance in MPEG point cloud compression》通过广泛的实验和分析，评估了MPEG点云压缩测试模型的性能。研究结果提供了对未来压缩解决方案发展或改进的有用见解（Alexiou et al., 2019）。
